channel.title: Blogs on 過鹿人部落格
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on 過鹿人部落格

item.title: [TED] 蓋伊•溫奇 為何我們需要情緒急救
item.description: By taking action when you’re lonely, by changing your responses to failure, by protecting your self-esteem, by battling negative thinking, you won’t just heal your psychological wounds, you will build emotional resilience, you will thrive.

item.title: 超實用免費截圖軟體：Snipaste
item.description: 用對工具，提升效率！ 假業配，真推薦 自從某次看到同事用這個截圖軟體， 不看還好，一看驚為天人! (微浮誇) 雖然已經有很多高手們推薦過， 但因為實在太喜歡它，

item.title: 最艱難的一步，永遠是開始
item.description: You don’t need to be confident to start. You need to start, and be confident.
